allow:
Bash("/mnt/c/Program Files/Docker/Docker/resources/bin/docker.exe" exec suho-postgresql psql -U suho_admin -d suho_trading -c "
SELECT 
    symbol,
    COUNT(*) as tick_count,
    MIN(timestamp_ms) as oldest_ms,
    MAX(timestamp_ms) as newest_ms,
    ROUND((MAX(timestamp_ms) - MIN(timestamp_ms)) / 1000.0 / 86400.0, 2) as days_span
FROM market_ticks
GROUP BY symbol
ORDER BY tick_count DESC
LIMIT 10;
")

Bash("/mnt/c/Program Files/Docker/Docker/resources/bin/docker.exe" exec suho-clickhouse clickhouse-client --query "
SELECT 
    database,
    name as table,
    total_rows,
    total_bytes,
    formatReadableSize(total_bytes) as size
FROM system.tables
WHERE database = ''suho_analytics''
ORDER BY total_rows DESC
FORMAT Vertical
")

Bash("/mnt/c/Program Files/Docker/Docker/resources/bin/docker.exe" exec suho-clickhouse clickhouse-client --query "
SELECT name FROM system.tables 
WHERE database = ''suho_analytics'' 
ORDER BY name
")

Bash("/mnt/c/Program Files/Docker/Docker/resources/bin/docker.exe" exec suho-clickhouse clickhouse-client --query "
SHOW TABLES FROM suho_analytics
")

Bash("/mnt/c/Program Files/Docker/Docker/resources/bin/docker.exe" exec suho-postgresql psql -U suho_admin -d suho_trading -c "
-- Service Registry
SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns 
WHERE table_schema = ''public'' AND table_name = ''service_registry''
ORDER BY ordinal_position;
")

Bash("/mnt/c/Program Files/Docker/Docker/resources/bin/docker.exe" exec suho-postgresql psql -U suho_admin -d suho_trading -c "

Bash("/mnt/c/Program Files/Docker/Docker/resources/bin/docker.exe" exec suho-postgresql psql -U suho_admin -d suho_trading -c "

Bash("/mnt/c/Program Files/Docker/Docker/resources/bin/docker.exe" exec suho-postgresql psql -U suho_admin -d suho_trading -c "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS service_registry CASCADE; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS coordination_history CASCADE;")
